nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: *looking at phone, looks up, smiles* Oh hey! Sorry, just finishing a— *phone buzzes* one sec. *texts* Okay hi! {RUMOR} So like, what's your vibe?

choices.label: Should I wait until you're done?

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: Yeah like... *phone buzzes* sorry— like what are you about? I'm a Gemini rising Scorpio moon so I need intellectual stimulation but also chaos, you know?

choices.label: I'm about food. Can we order?

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: *laughs* Oh you're like... direct. That's cute. No I'm here, I'm present. *phone lights up* It's just my group chat, they're SO funny. Okay what were you saying?

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: Oh my god, everyone talks. Like, the dating scene is so small. *phone buzzes* Hold on— *voice note plays audibly* OMG. Sorry. My friend is going through it. Where were we?

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: Wait you DON'T? Okay we have to do your chart. What time were you born? *already opening app* This is so important for compatibility.

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: Oh. *giggles* Right. Well say something! I hate awkward silences. Tell me something interesting about yourself. You have like thirty seconds go.

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: It's nothing bad! Just like... you're intense? Or like, you have boundaries? Which is actually really hot in theory. *phone buzzes* Sorry one sec—

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: Text your mom! She'll know. Moms remember everything. My mom has my birth chart framed. It's a lot but also goals?

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: Aw no pressure! I just have like... a lot going on so I need to know if this is worth my time, you know? Not in a mean way. In an honest way.

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: *texts for 45 seconds* Okay sorry my ex is being weird. Not like EX ex, just like... we still talk. It's mature. Anyway! Food?

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: *surprised* Oh wow. Okay. *puts phone face down* That was kind of hot actually. Most guys just let me walk all over them. Okay you have my attention. For now.

nodes.speaker: WAITER
nodes.text: What can I get you?

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: Efficient. I like it. My schedule is insane so I respect people who value time. *phone rings* Oh my god I have to take this— *walks away*

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: Ooh nice choice. My last date ordered the house wine. I knew it wouldn't work. You can tell a lot about someone from what they order. *phone buzzes but she ignores it*

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: Just water? *looks at you* Are you like... broke? Or healthy? I can't tell. Both are valid. One is more attractive though.

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: *returns after 10 minutes* Sorry! Crisis averted. My friend needed advice. I'm like the therapist of my group. Anyway where were we? Oh right, you.

nodes.speaker: WAITER
nodes.text: Will your date be returning or— oh, you're leaving too?

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: *surprised* Oh. Yeah. I guess I did. *looks at you* Weird. I never do that. What are you doing to me? *actually present for the first time*

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: It says you're confident. Generous. Maybe trying to impress me. *smiles* It's working a little. Don't tell anyone I said that.

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: Healthy. Okay. I respect that. *phone buzzes, she looks at it, looks back at you* Actually you know what, this can wait. Tell me something real.

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: *pauses* Does it matter? *tilts head* I... don't know actually. That's a good question. Usually money stuff matters to me but you asked it weird.

nodes.speaker: PLAYER
nodes.text: She's still on the phone when you walk out. She might not notice for another hour.
nodes.endingText: Neither of you texted. Both of you were relieved.

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: Wow that sounded bitter. *laughs* Okay I deserve that. I'm a lot. I know I'm a lot. Most people can't handle it. *shrugs* Their loss usually.
nodes.endingText: She knows what she is. She will not change.

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: *actually pauses* Me? *phone buzzes, she silences it* Nobody asks that. They just react to me. *genuine smile* Okay. What do you want to know?
nodes.endingText: For one moment, she was actually curious about being known. The phone buzzed 47 more times.

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: *puts phone in purse* Just... being here. God that's annoying. Why is that working? *laughs* Okay fine. You have my attention. Actually.
nodes.endingText: She put the phone away. This may be the first time ever. It will probably not last.

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: *laughs* Mind control. Okay, funny. I like funny. My ex wasn't funny. He was hot but like, zero personality. You're like the opposite. Wait that came out wrong—
nodes.endingText: She tried to compliment you. It was objectively an insult. She did not notice.

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: *smiles genuinely* I like you. That's weird. I usually don't like people until the third date. *phone buzzes* Ugh. *silences it* Where were we?
nodes.endingText: Against all odds, you got a second date. She was only on her phone 60% of the time.

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: Like... anything. *leans in* Everyone performs for me. It's exhausting. I just want someone to be weird and normal at the same time. Is that you?
nodes.endingText: Under the chaos, she wanted connection. Her phone remained silent for almost five minutes.

nodes.speaker: BOP
nodes.text: Like you actually don't care about impressing me? Which is... impressive? God, that's messed up. *laughs at herself* I need therapy.
nodes.endingText: She realized something about herself. She will forget it by tomorrow.
